page.title: 19CAERWYS CHURCH AND SCHOOL.
page.content: {ST MICHEAL'S CHURCH. The parish of Caerwys was recently grouped with that of Bodfari with the encumbent Rector,D Griffiths,living at Caerwys Rectory.Each Sunday there is a Sunday School at 10a.m. Communion service at 11a.m. Evensong is at 3.30 p.m. and there is additional communion services at 8 o'clock twice monthly. There are 14 choir members and between 20 and 30 attend Sunday School. {YSGOL YR ESGOB. Our School is very nice and new with lots of things to do and play.We have a Christmas Concert,Carol Service, Harvest Service,Sports, Swimming Gala, We play football,netball and rounders. There are three main classes:-Infant/ Nursery(3-7yrs) Lower Juniors(7-9)Top Juniors (10-11).We have teams called Glyndwr,Rhuddlan,Colwyn and Delyn which compete against each other.
